    • Constructor Detail

      • DataTableComponent

        public DataTableComponent()

    • Method Detail

      • getEvaluatedVar

        public Object getEvaluatedVar()
        Used to evaluate the var value into this component implementation.
        • The var variable is defined during the component declaration:
          <p62:dataTable var="foo">
        • and used in the <composite:insertChildren> like:
          <p:column>#{foo}</p:column>
        • Into custom component, it's not possible to access to this variable because the component doesn't know its name: #{foo}
        To fix the problem:
        1. The name of variable is passed, by parameter, to the custom component:
          <p62:dataTable var="foo">
        2. The value of variable is get into ExternalContext.getRequestMap(), to the key UIData.getVar().
        Returns:
        The evaluated var variable.

      • getFamily

        public String getFamily()
        Overrides:
        getFamily in class org.primefaces.component.datatable.DataTable
